description: yeehaa is an ecosystem architect with a PhD in Philosophy, blending academia and tech expertise. As an entrepreneur, thinker, and coder, he's dedicated to transforming education and knowledge sharing. He founded Offcourse and created the Superconnectors event format, advocating for an impactful and inclusive internet. Based in Taipei, yeehaa focuses on uniting people around common values and translating shared visions into effective ecosystems. His work spans topics like decentralization, digital landscapes, waste economy, and societal fragmentation. yeehaa's courses cover collaboration, innovation, and sustainable ecosystem development, while his blog posts explore concepts like ecosystem architecture, internet fragmentation, and the global village in the digital age.
blurb: yeehaa: ecosystem architect, PhD philosopher, and tech entrepreneur. Transforms education and knowledge sharing through innovative platforms and events. Explores decentralization, digital landscapes, and societal dynamics in his work.
